{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Machimos|It|Machimos}} was the outer city of the capital of [[Remuria]]. It held the [[Initium Iani]], the only way to access the inner city, [[Capitolium]].<ref name="Last">{{Ref/Quest|The Last Day of Remuria}}</ref> It once had grand temples and arenas, towering walls decorated with glaze and gold, bronze and marble statues, and bustling markets.<ref name="History">{{Ref/Book|The History of the Decline and Fall of Remuria}}</ref></p>}}

Machimos is not labeled on the [[Map]]; it once stood in the "Initium Iani" area. The tall rock formations there are likely its remnants.
